descriptionHtml:
Credits:

Madrilous - Scripter (Throwable Shield)
Quechus13 - Model and Textures

Captain America's Shield Version 3.0

This mod will add The Captain America Shield to your game!

It is located inside the "Bleakcoast Cave"

The "Bleakcoast Cave" is a small ice cave containing frost trolls. It is located southeast of Winterhold and directly east of the Shrine of Azura.

You can temper the shield now (still working on making it more powerful)

The new features include:

THROWABLE SHIELD
-------------------
2048x2048 Texture Upgrade
Model Upgraded
----------------------------------------
Resistant to Magic 25%
Resistant to Melee Damage 30%
Resistant to Fire 23%
Resistant to Frost 23%
author: Quechus13
